Player History
Drafted in 40th round, 628th overall pick, by St. Louis (C) in 2015...
Injured on 4/2/2015 with a Fractured Nose, out for 5 days...
Injured on 7/20/2015 with a Pulled Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit (double) on 9/4/2015, off Byron Serra (DET)...
1/31/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 5/3/2016 with a Bruised Hand, out for 2 days...
1/31/2017: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
9/20/2017: Signed a contract extension with St. Louis (C), $4,250,000 per year, for 3 years.
Hit first career homerun on 7/5/2018, off Jason Billie (COL)...
Injured on 8/11/2019 with a Torn Abdominal Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
